excerpt: Iconic arched railway bridge made of stone, brick & cement, bordered by lush greenery.
detail_description: The Nine Arches Bridge is a famous railway bridge constructed with stone, brick, and cement, surrounded by lush greenery. In addition to visiting the bridge itself, travelers can explore the nearby Ella market and enjoy various dining options in the area. While capturing photos of the bridge from both sides is not permitted without a permit due to regulations from the Sri Lankan Civil Aviation Authority, some individuals have been known to fly drones through the arches for unique perspectives.
name: Nine Arches Bridge
address: Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Ella Rock Trailhead is a must-visit when in Ella. The trail, starting at Ella train station, offers a 10 km hike through tea plantations, bridges, and eucalyptus forests. With an altitude of 1,348 m, the climb is not too strenuous but can be confusing due to unclear signposting. It's advisable to check the weather forecast before setting out and to carry sufficient water and food.
name: Ella Rock Trailhead
address: V25V+4JJ, Unnamed Road, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Little Adam's Peak is a must-visit destination in Ella, Sri Lanka. Unlike its namesake, the sacred Adams Peak, this smaller peak offers a more manageable and enjoyable hiking experience. The trailhead can be found near 98 Acres Resort and Spa, accessible via the Ella-Passara Road. The well-marked pathway leads through low scrub and wild grass to the 1,141-meter summit.
name: Little Adam's Peak
address: Sri Lanka

excerpt: Ella is a small town in the Badulla District of Uva Province, Sri Lanka governed by Ella Pradeshiya Sabha. It is approximately 200 kilometres east of Colombo and is situated at an elevation of 1,041 metres above sea level. The area has a rich bio-diversity, dense with numerous varieties of flora and fauna. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Ella is a charming town located in the Badulla District of Uva Province, Sri Lanka. Situated at an elevation of 1,041 meters above sea level, it boasts rich biodiversity with diverse flora and fauna. One of its main attractions is the Ravana Falls, known for being one of the widest waterfalls in Sri Lanka. The falls are nestled within the Ravana Ella Wildlife Sanctuary and offer opportunities for leisurely swims and rock climbing with stunning views.
name: Ella
address: Sri Lanka

excerpt: Tours of a garden growing spices like cloves & chili, plus lessons on how to cook a local curry.
detail_description: Ella Spice Garden Cooking Class is a unique experience located on the Wellawaya-Ella-Kumbalwela Highway, just a short walk from the Ella Railway Station. The garden offers guided tours showcasing various spices like cloves and chili, followed by cooking classes where you can learn to prepare local curries using these fresh ingredients. Additionally, visitors can enjoy a real Sri Lankan meal while learning about the different spices and their culinary uses.
name: Ella Spice Garden Cooking Class
address: Lizzie Villa Rd, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Experience the adrenaline-pumping Flying Ravana Mega Zipline in Ella, offering a heart-racing adventure over 500m at speeds exceeding 80km per hour. The friendly and professional staff provide clear instructions and ensure safety measures are in place. As you soar over lush greenery and tea estates, enjoy breathtaking views of the Ella Gap. Whether you're an experienced thrill-seeker or looking for something new, this zipline promises an unforgettable experience with its efficient system that eliminates long waits.
name: Flying Ravana Mega Zipline
address: 98 Adventures (Pvt) Ltd, Little Adams Peak Uva Greenland Estate, Ella - Passara Rd, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Nestled along the railroad trek, Small Rawana Waterfall is a hidden gem discovered by a local lady who maintains a small trail leading to it. The descent to the waterfall can be steep, but the effort is rewarded with a tranquil and picturesque setting. Visitors are encouraged to make a donation as a token of appreciation for accessing this natural wonder. Located at the entrance to the Ella rock trail, this waterfall offers an opportunity for a refreshing bath, although caution is advised due to safety concerns.
name: Small rawana waterfall
address: Oya arawa, Kithalella, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

excerpt: Secluded cliff cave linked to a mythical Hindu king & accessed by steep steps through lush forest.
detail_description: Ravana's Cave is a secluded cliff cave associated with a legendary Hindu king, accessible via steep steps through dense forest. Situated in Ella, Sri Lanka, the village is surrounded by stunning mountains, cloud forests, and lush tea plantations. The area also boasts other attractions like the Demodara Loop and Nine Arches Bridge known for their architectural innovation and picturesque surroundings. Additionally, visitors can explore the Dhowa Rock Temple and Cave nearby.
name: Ravana's Cave
address: V27X+QFR, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Cafe Chill, located in Ella, has evolved from a small roadside shack to a bustling two-story restaurant in the heart of town. It attracts a diverse crowd of travelers and locals looking to indulge in a variety of Western and Sri Lankan dishes along with flavorful cocktails. The cafe is renowned for its burgers served with hand-cut fries and coleslaw, as well as traditional local dish lamprais.
name: Cafe Chill
address: A23, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Ella is a charming destination in Sri Lanka, known for its family-run and budget-friendly restaurants. Visitors can enjoy flexible cooking classes at local establishments. The town is also famous for being the starting point of some of the best train rides in the country, particularly the scenic journey to Kandy. The train ride from Ella to Kandy offers breathtaking views of endless tea plantations. Additionally, travelers can embark on a rewarding trek from various railway stations to reach stunning natural attractions like rock formations.
name: Ella
address: Wellawaya-Ella-Kumbalwela Highway, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Matey Hut Ella Sri Lanka is a charming and cozy cafe located near the tunnel of Ella. It offers a rustic ambiance, perfect for escaping the hustle and bustle of daily life. The menu includes refreshing fruit smoothies, Ceylon tea, and mouthwatering snacks. This quaint spot also serves up delicious vegan eats at an affordable price. The restaurant is known for its tasty local food, including classic rice and curry dishes with four veg curries to try.
name: Matey Hut Ella Sri Lanka
address: No.91, near the tunnel, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Kuda Ravana Ella, also known as Ravana Falls, is a must-see attraction in the charming town of Ella, Sri Lanka. As one of the widest waterfalls in the country, it offers a stunning natural spectacle that draws both adventure enthusiasts and nature lovers. The waterfall cascades down from an oval-shaped rock outcrop, creating a picturesque 25-meter drop with considerable width.
name: Kuda Ravana Ella waterfall
address: V26V+XJX, A23, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: The Ceylon Tea Factory is not just a tea house, but also a unique restaurant in Ella, Sri Lanka. The venue's quirky interiors are designed to resemble a tea factory, offering an ambiance that sets it apart from other dining spots. The menu features both traditional Sri Lankan dishes like curries and hot rice as well as international cuisine.
name: Ceylon Tea Factory
address: Ambagollapathana, 4 Passara Rd, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: The Little Adam's Peak Trailhead is a popular hike in Ella, known for its manageable difficulty and stunning views. The trail starts from Ella's main street and is well-marked, making it easily accessible. While the walk uphill can be tiring, there are plenty of opportunities to rest along the way. Near the trailhead at Ravana pool club, visitors can park their vehicles before embarking on a short 20-minute climb to viewpoint 1.
name: Little Adam's Peak Trailhead
address: Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Ravana Pool Club is a stunning destination located beneath Little Adams Peak and Ravana Zip-Lining, offering a perfect spot to unwind after a day of hiking or zip-lining. The pool provides a refreshing retreat, complemented by a restaurant serving delectable appetizers and a bar offering poolside drinks. Visitors praise the attentive staff and immaculate facilities, including the Ella swing experience.
name: Ravana Pool Club
address: Uva Greenland Estate, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

excerpt: Casual lodging with mountain views, plus a terrace & a quaint restaurant serving regional cuisine.
detail_description: Ella Gap Panorama offers casual lodging with stunning mountain views, a terrace, and a charming restaurant serving regional cuisine. The location provides comfortable rooms with clean balconies and fridges. The staff is friendly and the English-style breakfast is delightful. Situated on a steep hill, it offers a peaceful stay away from the touristy spots in the valley. The hotel boasts an amazing panoramic view of Ella Gap and is pet-friendly.
name: Ella Gap Panorama
address: Kithalella Road, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Nestled within the breathtaking 98-acre tea estate in Ella, the Helipad of 98 Acres Resort and Spa offers a luxurious boutique hotel experience. The resort boasts stunning landscapes and provides guests with top-notch comforts.
name: Helipad of 98 Acres Resort and Spa
address: V396+C7H, B113, Passara, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Nestled on the picturesque slopes of Ella, Sri Lanka, Rainbow Cafe is a delightful gem that promises an unforgettable dining experience amidst the stunning hill country. This vibrant eatery boasts a lively ambiance and welcoming staff, making it a perfect spot to unwind. The menu is a feast for the senses, featuring an array of traditional Sri Lankan dishes alongside international favorites and creative fusion options that are sure to please any palate.
name: Rainbow Cafe
address: 41 Badulla - Bandarawela Rd, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Nestled in the lush, undulating highlands of Sri Lanka, Ella Odyssey Inn offers a comfortable stay with warm hospitality. The seven-hour train ride from Kandy to Ella provides breathtaking views of tea plantations, jungle, and mountains. The inn's immaculately clean and beautifully decorated rooms offer a sense of luxury and comfort, complemented by stunning views. While there were some issues with amenities, the friendly customer service made the experience enjoyable.
name: Ella Odyssey Inn
address: 16 Ella - Passara Rd, Ella, Sri Lanka

name: Kinellan Tea Factory & Tea Centre
address: A23, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

excerpt: Relaxed, modern hotel offering mountain views, plus a restaurant & a tropical garden.
detail_description: Perched atop the Ella-pass, Ravana Heights offers a relaxed and modern stay with breathtaking 360-degree mountain views. The owner is known for being friendly and accommodating, often arranging trekking trips for guests. The higher priced rooms are spacious, modern, and equipped with amenities like air conditioning, flat screen TVs, and free wifi. All accommodations feature private balconies to soak in the stunning vistas. Additionally, the hotel boasts a restaurant, tropical garden, sun terrace, and free parking.
name: Ravana Heights
address: V2CX+9CM, A23, Ella, Sri Lanka

name: Ella
address: 46 Wellawaya-Ella-Kumbalwela Hwy, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: AK Ristoro is a popular dining spot in Ella, offering a mix of Italian, Japanese, Spanish tapas, and British fish and chips. The restaurant has recently reopened after a hiatus and serves up European and Italian-inspired cuisine with some Eastern-inspired dishes as well. It's located in a quieter part of Ella, just a short walk from the main road. The menu includes Sri Lankan and international meals alongside classic Italian dishes like pasta.
name: Ak Ristoro
address: 37 Ella - Passara Rd, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Ella, Sri Lanka, The Barn by Starbeans is a charming cafe housed in a rustic barn-style building. With its vintage decor and warm ambiance, it's the perfect spot for a relaxed meal or casual coffee break. The menu offers a variety of options from hearty breakfasts to international dishes like Italian and Mexican cuisine, as well as seafood. Visitors can also enjoy wood-fired pizzas and cocktails at this inviting eatery.
name: The Barn by Starbeans
address: No. 50 Wellawaya Road, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Rocky Ella Cafe in Sri Lanka is a versatile spot that offers strong wifi, accommodating service, and a variety of food options. While some visitors found the pizza to be disappointing, others enjoyed the flavorful and fresh breakfast offerings like smoothie bowls and mixed fruit juice. The cafe also caters to vegans and those with gluten-free dietary needs. The atmosphere is described as cozy and serene, making it a great place for a relaxing meal or people-watching session.
name: Rocky Ella Cafe
address: Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

excerpt: Bright rooms with mountain views in a casual hotel offering a restaurant, a terrace & a garden.
detail_description: Nestled in the picturesque town of Ella, Ellas Edge Resort offers comfortable accommodations with stunning mountain views. The hotel features spacious and bright rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows and balconies overlooking the scenic Ella Gap. Guests can enjoy delicious meals at the on-site restaurant while taking in panoramic views of the surroundings. The resort's attentive staff goes above and beyond to ensure a pleasant stay, providing valuable information about local attractions and offering exceptional service.
name: Ella's Edge Resort
address: Peramas Ella, Sandungama Rd, Ella 90100, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Lanka Cooking Classes offers a unique and enjoyable experience where visitors can learn to cook authentic Sri Lankan dishes in a welcoming home environment. The classes are led by Mr. Lanka, who is known for his friendly demeanor and excellent English skills. Participants have praised the class for its informative nature, as well as the opportunity to learn about traditional cooking methods and ingredient substitutions. Many have also appreciated the chance to share a meal at the end of the class, creating a truly memorable experience.
name: Lanka Cooking Classes
address: 39 Passara Rd, Ambagollapathana Passara Rd, Ambagollapathana, Sri Lanka

name: Nine Arches Bridge Viewpoint
address: V3G6+X3, Ambagollapathana, Sri Lanka

detail_description: The Cafe Eden is a lovely little restaurant in Ella that serves delicious Sri Lankan food. The atmosphere is intimate and the service is friendly, making it a great place to visit for a casual meal or for a more formal occasion. The menu includes both traditional and modern Sri Lankan dishes, making it perfect for diners of all tastes and dietary restrictions. Prices are reasonable, making it easy to enjoy a good meal without breaking the bank.
name: Cafe Eden
address: 3rd Mile Post, Ella - Passara Rd, Ambagollapathana, Sri Lanka

detail_description: At N2 Restaurant, the initial dining experience was pleasant with friendly service staff. The standout dish was the egg kutto rotti, which resembled the flavorful fried carrot cake from Singapore but with added ingredients. The cheese rotti also impressed as they were generous with their usage of a cheese reminiscent of laughing cow cheese. However, the chicken fried rice left something to be desired as the portion of chicken was almost insignificant.
name: N2 Restaurant
address: Main Street, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

name: Ceylon Tea Centre Ella
address: V2FX+9J8, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Ella Mount Relax Cottages is a conveniently located accommodation for hikers, situated on the northeast side of town, making it an ideal base for those looking to explore Little Adams Peak and Ella Rock. Guests have praised the breathtaking panoramic views of the mountains and landscapes from this mountain lodge. The staff's attentiveness and helpfulness have been highlighted, with special mentions for the manager who goes out of his way to cater to guests' needs.
name: Ella Mount Relax Cottages
address: V3C2+4WG, Passara Road, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Ella Udessa Bed & Breakfast is a charming retreat nestled in the picturesque town of Ella, Sri Lanka. Surrounded by lush greenery and just a stone's throw from popular attractions like the Demodara Nine Arch Bridge, this cozy accommodation offers a delightful blend of comfort and hospitality. Guests can enjoy spacious rooms with options for balconies or seating areas, perfect for soaking in the serene views.
name: Ella Udessa Bed & Breakfast
address: No 50 Waterfall Rd, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

name: Ella Organic Tea Garden
address: Kitelella Rd, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Nestled near the vibrant heart of Ella, Winwood Ella offers a delightful retreat for travelers seeking both comfort and charm. The main street of this quaint town is alive with an array of bars, cafes, and restaurants alongside unique souvenir shops that invite exploration. As you meander through the town center, you'll find a welcoming atmosphere infused with a laid-back backpacker vibe.
name: Winwood Ella
address: Water Fall road, 60/C Wemullahena, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

name: Thvindi Ayurvedic Massage Center
address: E156/B Ella - Passara Rd, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Nestled in the picturesque town of Ella, Sri Lanka, Mount Heaven offers a slice of paradise with its breathtaking panoramic views of misty mountains and lush green valleys. The property boasts cozy and well-appointed rooms, warm hospitality, and delectable cuisine that promise an unforgettable stay. Guests can unwind in the tranquil ambiance or take a refreshing dip in the infinity pool after a day of exploration.
name: Mount heaven
address: V28X+X4R, Wellawaya-Ella-Kumbalwela Hwy, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: When you visit Sumaramaya Temple, you can engage with the Buddhist monks who reside there. While some may converse in English, others might communicate solely in the local language. Nevertheless, a guide is available to provide English translations if needed. This interaction offers an insightful glimpse into the spiritual practices and traditions of the temple.
name: Sumaramaya Temple
address: V29V+W87, Temple Road Kithalella Ella, Ella, Sri Lanka

name: Tunnel Cafe
address: V2FW+F7P, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Ella is home to the famous Nine Arch Bridge, a captivating attraction known for its massive 24-meter structure set amidst a enchanting jungle backdrop. The bridge's distinctive ancient design featuring nine grand arches gives it an almost magical quality, making it a must-see destination in Sri Lanka.
name: Ella
address: V3G6+Q77, Nine Arches Bridge Natural Rd, Ambagollapathana, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Yahalamadiththa Rajamaha Viharaya is a significant Buddhist temple known for its annual perahera ceremony where the jewels of Pattini are brought to the devalaya. The shrine, which is only open during festival season, offers a unique opportunity to witness this traditional procession.
name: Yahalamadiththa Rajamaha Viharaya
address: V2JW+34R, Halpe Road, Ella, Sri Lanka

name: Ella jungle inn homestay &Tree house
address: Ella - Passara Rd, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Deergayu Ayurvedic Spa in Ella offers traditional Sri Lankan-style massages that are perfect for unwinding after a long day of exploring. The friendly receptionist, Kasun, ensures a warm welcome and helps with booking sessions. Visitors have praised the skilled masseurs like Sadeepa and Randika for their ability to relieve pain and provide an amazing massage experience.
name: deergayu ayurvedic spa - Ella
address: grand view, B 2 Ella - Passara Rd, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Foody Adventures Cooking Class in Ella, Sri Lanka is highly praised for its exceptional staff and authentic Sri Lankan cuisine. Visitors rave about the traditional dishes and the overall experience at this top-notch establishment.
name: Foody Adventures Cooking Class, Ella, Sri Lanka
address: Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Rawana waterfall is a breathtaking natural wonder located in the picturesque Ella region of Sri Lanka's Hill Country. This stunning waterfall is a must-see attraction for tourists visiting the area, offering a mesmerizing sight and an opportunity to connect with nature at its finest.
name: Rawana
address: V28W+MJF, Ella, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Sri Bhavan Ella, located in Ella, offers a picturesque view of the garden and mountains. The homestay provides amenities such as free private parking, 24-hour front desk service, and complimentary WiFi. Guests have praised the spacious and clean rooms with incredible terraces. The homemade breakfasts prepared by the owner are highly appreciated. Visitors also enjoyed comfortable beds and large breakfasts during their stay at this superb place.
name: Sri Bhavan Ella
address: 202c Athulgashinna Ella, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

excerpt: This popular waterfall is one of the country's widest & has a cave mentioned in an Indian epic poem.
detail_description: Rawana Falls is a well-known waterfall, renowned for being one of the widest in the country. It is also famous for its association with an Indian epic poem, as it features a cave that holds historical significance.
name: Rawana Falls.
address: Colombo - Galle - Hambantota - Wellawaya Rd, Ella 90900, Sri Lanka

detail_description: Ella Nine Arch Spice Garden offers a serene and peaceful stay surrounded by nature's beauty. The property provides a tranquil setting with a garden, free WiFi, and complimentary private parking. Its proximity to Ella Railway Station and attractions like Ella Spice Garden and Demodara Railway Station makes it convenient for exploration. The spacious rooms offer breathtaking views of Ella's lush hills and starry nights, although the stairs may be challenging for those with heavy luggage.
name: Ella nine arch spice garden
address: Nine arch road, maduragama, gotuwala, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka

name: NilDiya Pokuna
address: R3M8+78J, Udakirida, Sri Lanka

name: Ella-Black pepper and cinamon garden
address: 9th Mile Post,uva-karadagolla, Ella 90090, Sri Lanka
